messages.author: Chief Medical Officer's Desk
messages.body: Welcome station, remember to enable your suit sensors so we can recover you

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: I was not responsible for that last announcment, and whoever made it is to be questioned.

messages.author: Chief Medical Officer's Desk
messages.body: The chem dispenser is loaded with Bicaridine and Kelotane pills, please use them instead of breaking into med storage for your little cuts and scrapes

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Locker Room.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Hostile runtimes detected in all station systems, please deactivate your AI to prevent possible damage to its morality core.
